NXT.MC.summary: Nueva ExpresiÃ³n Textil, S.A. manufactures and sells fabrics. It provides its products for lingerie, swimwear, and sportswear under the anna llop, QTT, DOGI, Ritex, Elastic Fabrics of America, SICI 93, playvest, and TREISS brand names. The company was formerly known as Dogi International Fabrics, S.A. Nueva ExpresiÃ³n Textil, S.A. was founded in 1954 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.
